pr_title: Add the allowed values for quarkus.kubernetes.service-type

timeline.bodyText: Is it an enum? If so it should be cluster-ip, node-port...
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -418,6 +418,9 @@ Below you will find tables describing all available types.
 
 === Basic Types
 
+.ServiceType
+Allowed values: `ClusterIP`, `NodePort`, `LoadBalancer`, `ExternalName`

replies.bodyText: Looks like we have a bug with the default value generation. At the very least, it should be hyphenated, or display as is if @DefaultConverter is used. I'll have a look at it.
replies.author: machi1990

replies.bodyText: It is an enum, but the values I provides should work (I tested the NodePort)
replies.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: But I'll update it in any case
replies.author: geoand

replies.bodyText:
It is an enum, but the values I provides should work (I tested the NodePort)

Yes, it should work because the HyphenateEnumConverter was made to be lenient in a way that it will default to using valueOf() sort of by hyphenating the input config value value if the hyphenated case does not work. But the idea was to push for hyphenation as the default as much as possible.
replies.author: machi1990

timeline.message: Add the allowed values for quarkus.kubernetes.service-type
Add the allowed values for quarkus.kubernetes.service-type
